item.title: 亚马逊机器人出租车部门 Zoox 在拉斯维加斯自动驾驶车祸后召回车辆
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com）的自动驾驶部门 Zoox 同意召回 270 辆无人驾驶汽车，因为一辆无人驾驶机器人出租车 4 月 8 日在拉斯维加斯与一辆乘用车相撞。【原文：Amazon.com's self-driving unit Zoox agreed to recall 270 driverless vehicles after an unoccupied robotaxi was involved in an April 8 crash with a passenger car in Las Vegas.】

item.title: 民主党议员破坏关键听证会，特朗普的加密货币投资引发紧张局势泡沫化
item.description: 周二，美国国会山因唐纳德-特朗普总统的各种加密货币投资项目而出现的紧张局势升级，并有可能破坏数字资产行业在今年年底前立法的希望，因为一位民主党高级立法者阻止了就一项法案进行辩论的努力。【原文：Tensions on Capitol Hill over President Donald Trump's various cryptocurrency ventures escalated on Tuesday and threatened to derail the digital asset sector's hope of legislation by the end of this year as a top Democratic lawmaker stalled efforts to debate a bill.】

item.title: 思科展示量子网络芯片并开设新实验室
item.description: 思科系统公司周二展示了一款用于将量子计算机联网的原型芯片，并表示将在加利福尼亚州圣莫尼卡开设一个新实验室，以进一步研究量子计算。【原文：Cisco Systems on Tuesday showed a prototype chip for networking quantum computers together and said it is opening a new lab in Santa Monica, California, to further pursue quantum computing.】

item.title: 英特尔股东批准股权激励计划和新 CEO 薪酬
item.description: 英特尔股东周二批准了一项公司措施，旨在充实股票储备，以吸引和留住新员工，并为新任首席执行官陈立武提供补偿。【原文：Intel shareholders on Tuesday approved a company measure aimed at topping up share reserves to attract and retain new employees and compensation for new CEO Lip-Bu Tan.】

item.title: 特朗普称将在未来几周评估贸易协议
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周二表示，他和政府高层官员将在未来两周内审查潜在的贸易协议，以决定接受哪些协议。【原文：President Donald Trump said on Tuesday that he and top administration officials will review potential trade deals over the next two weeks to decide which ones to accept.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会结束对摩根士丹利现金清算计划的调查，未采取任何执法行动
item.description: 华尔街银行摩根士丹利在周一提交的一份文件中表示，美国证券交易委员会已结束对摩根士丹利咨询账户现金清算计划的调查，不会采取执法行动。【原文：The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission has ended its investigation into Morgan Stanley's cash sweep program for advisory accounts and will not pursue enforcement action, the Wall Street bank said in a filing dated Monday.】

item.title: Constellation 重新关注并网人工智能数据中心电力项目
item.description: 星座能源公司（Constellation Energy）高管周二表示，该公司正日益关注与美国电网连接的潜在数据中心项目，这与该公司之前强调直接从其发电厂为巨型服务器仓库提供燃料的做法有所不同。【原文：Constellation Energy is increasingly focused on potential data center projects that connect to the U.S. electrical grid in a pivot away from the company's previous emphasis on fueling the giant server warehouses directly from its power plants, company executives said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 贝森特称美国本周可能宣布与一些国家达成贸易协议
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周二表示，特朗普政府最早可能在本周宣布与美国最大的一些贸易伙伴达成贸易协议，但没有透露涉及哪些国家的详细情况。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent on Tuesday said the Trump administration could announce trade agreements with some of the United States' largest trade partners as early as this week, but gave no details on which countries were involved.】

item.title: 汉堡王必须面对有关 Whopper 广告的诉讼
item.description: 汉堡王（Burger King）必须面对一桩诉讼，该诉讼称汉堡王在广告中误导顾客，使其 Whopper 三明治和其他产品看起来比实际尺寸大。【原文：Burger King must face a lawsuit claiming it misleads customers with advertisements that make its Whopper sandwich and other products appear larger than they are.】

item.title: 受美国关税影响，零售商寻求在欧洲实现增长
item.description: 越来越多的零售商和消费品牌正在将重点从美国转向欧洲和其他市场，因为他们预计美国关税将引发价格上涨，从而导致美国消费者需求下降。【原文：Growing numbers of retailers and consumer brands are shifting their focus to Europe and other markets from the United States, as they expect U.S. tariffs to spark price hikes that will drive American consumer demand down.】

item.title: 纽约联储发现四月份供应链压力有所缓解
item.description: 尽管全球各经济体急于应对特朗普政府大规模和不断变化的贸易关税的影响，但供应链压力在上个月仍有所缓解。【原文：Supply chain pressures eased last month even as economies around the world rushed to position themselves for the impact of massive and shifting trade tariffs by the Trump administration.】

item.title: 马斯克的 xAI 加入 TWG Global 和 Palantir，共同推动金融领域的人工智能发展
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的人工智能公司xAI与Palantir Technologies和投资公司TWG Global周二表示，双方已建立合作伙伴关系，共同发掘金融服务业日益增长的人工智能需求。【原文：Elon Musk's artificial intelligence company xAI has partnered with Palantir Technologies and investment firm TWG Global, the companies said on Tuesday, as they look to tap growing AI demand in the financial services industry.】

item.title: 微软推出搭载高通芯片的低价人工智能笔记本电脑
item.description: 微软周二表示，它将以比以往更低的价格发布采用高通公司芯片的新款笔记本电脑和平板电脑，旨在向更广泛的客户提供新的人工智能功能。【原文：Microsoft on Tuesday said it will release a new laptop and tablet with chips from Qualcomm at lower prices than before, aiming to get new AI features to a broader set of customers.】

item.title: 严格削减成本后，Gartner 上调年度利润预期
item.description: 周二，技术研究公司 Gartner 的季度利润超出预期，并上调了全年盈利预期，这表明尽管关税导致经济不确定性，但严格的成本控制有助于公司保持弹性。【原文：Technology research firm Gartner topped quarterly profit expectations on Tuesday and bumped up its full-year earnings forecast, signaling that tight cost controls were helping it stay resilient despite tariff-driven economic uncertainty.】

item.title: 人工智能驱动云安全需求，Datadog上调年度收入预期
item.description: 云安全公司 Datadog 周二上调了全年营收预期，季度销售额超过预期，这主要得益于大客户和人工智能驱动的工作负载的增长。【原文：Cloud security firm Datadog raised its annual revenue forecast and beat the estimate for quarterly sales on Tuesday, thanks to growth in large customers and AI-driven workloads.】

item.title: AMETEK 将收购 FARO Technologies，交易价值 9.2 亿美元
item.description: 两家公司周二表示，工业工具制造商 AMETEK 将以约 9.2 亿美元的企业价值收购 FARO Technologies，这使得目标公司的股价在早盘交易中飙升了 36%。【原文：Industrial tools maker AMETEK will acquire FARO Technologies at an enterprise value of about $920 million, the two companies said on Tuesday, sending the target firm's shares soaring 36% in early trade.】

item.title: 美国三月份贸易赤字创历史新高
item.description: 美国贸易赤字在 3 月份扩大至历史新高，原因是企业在加征关税之前增加了商品进口，这拖累了第一季度国内生产总值三年来首次出现负增长。【原文：The U.S. trade deficit widened to a record high in March as businesses boosted imports of goods ahead of tariffs, which dragged gross domestic product into negative terrain in the first quarter for the first time in three years.】

item.title: 包装食品需求疲软，WK Kellogg 下调年度销售额和利润预期
item.description: WK Kellogg 周二下调了年度有机销售额和核心利润预期，原因是消费者对 Frosted Flakes 和 Apple Jacks 谷物等高价产品的消费疲软。【原文：WK Kellogg cut its annual organic sales and core profit forecasts on Tuesday after weaker consumer spending on its higher-priced products including Frosted Flakes and Apple Jacks cereals.】

item.title: Uber 拟以 7 亿美元收购 Trendyol GO 食品配送业务 85% 的股份
item.description: 优步科技公司（Uber Technologies）周二表示，已与土耳其电子商务公司 Trendyol Group 达成协议，将以约 7 亿美元现金收购其 Trendyol GO 在线食品配送业务 85% 的股份。【原文：Uber Technologies said on Tuesday it has entered into an agreement with Turkish e-commerce firm Trendyol Group to acquire an 85% stake in its Trendyol GO online food delivery business for about $700 million in cash.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，卡塔尔航空公司将向波音公司订购约 100 架宽体喷气机
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二援引知情人士的话报道，卡塔尔航空公司正在敲定从波音公司购买约 100 架宽体喷气式飞机的交易，并可选择购买更多数量的喷气式飞机。【原文：Qatar Airways is finalizing a deal to buy around 100 widebody jets from Boeing , with an option to buy as many more, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 瑞银与通用大西洋公司合作拓展私人信贷业务
item.description: 瑞士信贷机构瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）和美国投资公司通用大西洋公司（General Atlantic）周二表示，双方已建立合作伙伴关系，共同拓展私人信贷市场。【原文：Swiss lender UBS Group AG and U.S. investment firm General Atlantic have launched a partnership to expand into the private credit market, the companies said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 穆迪称，美国银行适度使用风险转移工具对信用有利
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）在对 69 家获得评级的美国银行进行调查后在一份报告中指出，只有极少部分美国银行发行了复杂的产品，使其能够从贷款组合中摆脱风险，而且这种产品的使用率相对较低，是一种信用利好。【原文：A very small proportion of U.S. banks have issued a complex product that enabled them to shed risk from loan portfolios and the relatively modest use of the products was a credit positive, Moody’s Ratings said in a report after surveying 69 rated U.S. banks.】

item.title: 纬创公司将向美国新部门追加投资 4.55 亿美元
item.description: 台湾电子制造商和人工智能服务器制造商纬创公司（Wistron Corp）周二表示，董事会已批准向其新成立的美国子公司追加投资 4.55 亿美元。【原文：Taiwanese electronics manufacturer and AI server maker Wistron Corp said on Tuesday its board has approved an additional investment of $455 million in its new U.S. subsidiary.】

item.title: 支付处理商 FIS 预测第二季度利润疲软，支出放缓担忧加剧
item.description: 银行和支付处理公司富达国家信息服务公司周二预测第二季度利润低于华尔街预期，反映出人们对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）与中国的贸易战继续给消费者情绪带来压力，从而抑制消费者支出的担忧。【原文：Banking and payments processing firm Fidelity National Information Services forecast second-quarter profit below Wall Street estimates on Tuesday, reflecting concerns of dampened consumer spending as President Donald Trump's trade war with China continues to pressure consumer sentiment.】

item.title: 芯片需求稳定，GlobalFoundries 第二季度营收和利润高于预期
item.description: 本周二，GlobalFoundries 预测第二季度收入和利润略高于华尔街预期，这表明尽管汽车生产不景气，智能手机市场疲软，但这家合约芯片制造商仍看到了稳定的需求。【原文：GlobalFoundries forecast second-quarter revenue and profit slightly above Wall Street estimates on Tuesday, in a sign that the contract chipmaker was seeing stable demand despite choppy auto production and a soft smartphone market.】

item.title: 彭博新闻社报道：如果谈判失败，欧盟计划对1000亿欧元美国商品征收关税
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二报道，如果贸易谈判未能取得令欧盟满意的结果，欧盟计划对价值约1000亿欧元（约合1132.6亿美元）的美国商品征收额外关税。【原文：The European Union plans to hit about 100 billion euros ($113.26 billion) worth of U.S. goods with additional tariffs if trade talks fail to deliver a satisfactory result for the bloc, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 聚焦：从反弹到拯救：Argentex 如何因未经测试的货币波动而崩溃
item.description: 4 月初，Argentex 的首席执行官吉姆-奥蒙德（Jim Ormonde）和首席财务官盖-鲁道夫（Guy Rudolph）购买了这家在伦敦上市的外汇经纪商的股票，因为该股从 3 月份的暴跌中反弹。【原文：In early April, Argentex's chief executive Jim Ormonde and chief financial officer Guy Rudolph were buying shares in the London-listed foreign exchange broker as the stock rebounded from a March slump.】

item.title: 消费者支出保持稳定，全球支付调整后利润增长
item.description: 本周二，Global Payments 公布第一季度调整后利润增长，商户解决方案业务收入的持续增长为其带来了支撑。【原文：Global Payments reported a rise in first-quarter adjusted profit on Tuesday, bolstered by consistent revenue growth from its merchant solutions business.】

item.title: Palantir 季度业绩未能给投资者留下深刻印象，股价跳水
item.description: Palantir Technologies 的股价在周二的盘前交易中下跌了约 7%，此前的季度业绩和上调的预期未能达到华尔街投资者的高预期，而投资者在财报发布前曾推动股价大幅上涨。【原文：Shares of Palantir Technologies slumped about 7% in premarket trading on Tuesday, after quarterly results and a raised forecast failed to meet the high expectations of Wall Street investors, who had driven the stock price up significantly ahead of earnings.】

item.title: 报告称，M&S 和 Co-op 网络攻击者欺骗 IT 服务台重置密码
item.description: 据技术专业网站 BleepingComputer 报道，对英国玛莎百货和 Co-op 集团的网络攻击始于黑客冒充员工与零售商的 IT 服务台联系。【原文：Cyberattacks on Britain's Marks & Spencer and Co-op Group started with hackers impersonating employees while contacting the retailers' IT help desks, technology specialist site BleepingComputer reported.】
